attributes.action: establish signs on roads on the Prime Meridian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Meridian of the World (zero degrees longitude) runs north-south through Greenwich and much of England.

It would not be very costly to erect signs whenever a road crosses the meridian stating 'You are entering the Western Hemisphere', or something similar.

However this would be of genuine interest to motorists and other road users.
